post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Candidate Required:        Intermediate Java Developer
Opportunity Description:        Our Financial services Client is looking for an Intermediate Java Developer to join their team in a Permanent Capacity.

Their main responsibilities include:

Providing team leadership in the technical design, development, testing and implementation of solutions and applications.
. Working closely with Application Architect to ensure that the application designs are carried onto the finished products
. Working closely with Application Development Manager and Application Architect to ensure that the development and application security guidelines are adhered to through code review
. Working with the project team in the preparation and tracking of the project schedule
. Providing technical leadership to assigned project staff throughout the application development cycle
. Coordinating assigned activities to project team
. Working closely with project team to ensure that project deliverables are met on time and on budget, as agreed upon in the project plan
. Investigating and resolving technical project issues and problems

Providing technical application development expertise to deliver clients' IT requirements and support websites and applications already in production by:
. Analyzing, coding, fixing and enhancing complex programming modules based on technical design and specifications, and in compliance with corporate IT development standards
. Developing and overseeing testing and implementation of systems and applications
. Recommending technical application development solutions which meet design specifications and client needs and promote overall corporate technology strategy
. Acting as a resource in the resolution of technical problems
. Establishing and maintaining tools, techniques, standards, documentation and performance criteria required for developing applications
. Coordinating development of all technical documentation such as technical specification and design document
. Working closely with the Architecture team in defining and implementing the technology infrastructure that meets the organizations strategic goals
. Provide application development expertise in completing research activities to establish technology approach/strategy/standards and best practices working with colleagues across the different technical teams
Specialization and Skills:        
Software Development        AJAX        5 - 7 years
DHTML        5 - 7 years
J2EE        5 - 7 years
Java        5 - 7 years
JavaScript        5 - 7 years
JSP        5 - 7 years
XML        5 - 7 years
Content/Training/Design        HTML        5 - 7 years
Additional Requirements:        Skill Name        Experience
Experience with agile development methodologies and related tools and processes        5 - 7 years
Experience with SQLServer, ORACLE or other relational databases and SQL        5 - 7 years
Experience with web and application servers such as Websphere, Apache, Tomcat        5 - 7 years
Experience with system deployment tools such as Maven and ANT        5 - 7 years
Experience with operating systems Unix, Linux, Windows NT and their scripting language        5 - 7 years
Knowledge of integrated development tools such as RAD and Eclipse, CVS        Capable
Knowledge of Software Design Patterns, UML, SDLC        Capable
Knowledge of network concepts        Capable
Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience        Mandatory
post.title: Intermediate Java Developer
